rules.rationale: 'bgpdat' = blood glucose profile data. The DCCT trial's primary outcome was glycemic control, making this the central measurement table. Contains C-peptide, creatinine, glucose, and HbA1c from baseline, quarterly visits, and close-out. 888 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables that provide information about blood glucose profiles collected at baseline, quarterly visits, and close-out.'

rules.rationale: 'hbam' = HbA1c measurements. HbA1c was the primary glycemic control indicator in DCCT. Collected at baseline, quarterly, and close-out. 236 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables describing HbA1c values, which were used as the main indicator of glycemic control'
'This dataset contains variables that represent ECG testing'
'The dataset represents variables that were used to obtain bone density measurements'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 030 = retinopathy assessment via fundus photography during follow-up. f0302/f0303 for different follow-up years. 143-144 vars. Pure retinal grading data.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Retinopathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: Form 035 = SCL-90R (Symptom Checklist-90-Revised), a specific validated instrument measuring 9 symptom dimensions. 145 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset represents variables of the SCL-90R questionnaire used for assessment of emotional status'

rules.rationale: Form 036 = DCCT-specific quality of life assessment instrument. 94 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect information about quality of life'

rules.rationale: Form 128 = SF-36 (Short Form 36), a widely-used generic health-related quality of life survey with 8 subscales. 76 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset represents variables of the SF-36 questionnaire'

rules.rationale: Form 122 = close-out psychological assessment administered at end of trial. 86 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset represents variables that assess (at close-out) psychological status'

rules.rationale: Form 027 = eye health status and functionality. Covers eye surgery, photocoagulation, intra-ocular pressure, eye medications. Pure ophthalmic assessment. 137 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset represents variables used to collect information about health status and functionality of eyes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 050 = neuropathy assessment during follow-up. Pure neuropathy evaluation (nerve conduction, sensory exam). f0502/f0503. 38-40 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Diabetic neuropathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC nephropathy follow-up dataset — renal function outcomes over 8 years. Pure kidney function assessment. 53 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Diabetic nephropathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes at 8 year follow-up'

rules.rationale: EDIC neuropathy follow-up dataset — nerve function outcomes over 8 years. 52 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Diabetic neuropathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes at 8 year follow-up'
